sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT * FROM metadata.control_table_learnIT WHERE IS_aCT_IND='Y' and source_system=@{pipeline().parameters.p_SOURCE_SYSTEM}

text.value:
@concat(
'update hr.config set startdate = ''', variables('StartDate'),
''', enddate = ''', utcNow(),
''', status = ''success'',
source = ', activity('Copy data1').output.rowsRead, ' ,
target = ', activity('Copy data1').output.rowsCopied,' 
where sourcetable = ''', item().sourcetable, ''''
)
@concat('update hr.config set status =''failed ''', 'where activeflag = 1 and status is null')

scripts.text: update  hr.config set status = null where activeflag =1
